tech_news.title: Apple Design Executive Alan Dye Poached by Meta in Major Coup - Bloomberg.com
tech_news.description: Meta Platforms Inc. has poached Apple Inc.’s most prominent design executive in a major coup that underscores a push by the social networking giant into AI-equipped consumer devices.

tech_news.title: Amazon Clears Out This Mac Mini Alternative Mini PC for Less Than Budget Earbuds, Preinstalled With Windows 11 Pro - Kotaku
tech_news.description: The GMKtec Nucbox G3S Mini PC runs dual 4K displays and cooks up to 3.4GHz while staying under $200 at Amazon.

tech_news.title: Everything new in Samsung’s next major Galaxy update, One UI 8.5, just leaked - 9to5Google
tech_news.description: Every new feature coming in Samsung Galaxy's One UI 8.5 update has leaked, and there's a lot in store for next year.

tech_news.title: Red Dead Redemption's free remaster upgrade is now available on Xbox - Windows Central
tech_news.description: Relive the harrowing tale of John Marston with 60fps gameplay and 4K resolutions as Red Dead Redemption's Remaster is now live for current-gen home consoles.

tech_news.title: Samus' death screams are no longer Jennifer Hale, as Dispatch actress takes over role for Metroid Prime 4: Beyond - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond has cast a new voice actress for Samus.

tech_news.title: The best games of 2025, picked by NPR's staff - NPR
tech_news.description: From indies like Blue Prince to big console exclusives like Donkey Kong Bananza, NPR staff members and contributors round up their favorite games of 2025.

tech_news.title: Mario Kart World Update 1.4.0 Tweaks Track Layouts, Adds Custom Item Rules, Now Lets You See What Music is Playing - IGN
tech_news.description: Nintendo Switch 2 launch title Mario Kart World has just received a meaty update that finally adds custom item rules, and tweaks a long list of course layouts.
